text: Novopokrovskoye () is a rural locality (a selo) in Mrakovsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 145 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 9 km from Mrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Novopokrovskoye, Republic of Bashkortostan
